data.title: Added Solutions Provider Silicon Software Partners.
meta_keywords: S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Interactive 3D Value-Added Solutions Provider www.s2partners.net Silicon Software Partners.
data.meta_description: S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Integration of stereoscopic 3D depth perception (image parallax) look-around capability (motion parallax) and direct kinesthetic interaction. zSpace Virtual Holographic Environment zSpace® is a registered trademark
data.text:
Presentation on theme: "S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Interactive 3D Value-Added Solutions Provider www.s2partners.net Silicon Software Partners."— Presentation transcript:

1 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Interactive 3D Value-Added Solutions Provider www.s2partners.net Silicon Software Partners

2 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Objective Provide Compelling Interactive 3D System-Level Solutions For Visualization And Measurement Of Complex 3D Semiconductor Structures That Enable Our Customers To Be Successful.

3 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Integration of stereoscopic 3D depth perception (image parallax) look-around capability (motion parallax) and direct kinesthetic interaction. zSpace Virtual Holographic Environment zSpace® is a registered trademark

4 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Virtually-holographic images appear “solid” in 3D open space, as if they are real physical objects Stereoscopic 3D depth perception with full-resolution images rendered for each eye (image parallax) Full motion parallax, with sensors tracking viewing angle of user, enabling user to look-around objects Lightweight passive circularly-polarized stereoscopic 3D eyewear with trackable markers Laser stylus designed for managing direct interactions with objects along Z-axis zSpace® is a registered trademark 4 zSpace Environment

5 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Dimensional Metrology Failure and Root Cause Analysis Modeling and Process Design Kits Process and Package Development Characterization and Quantification Semiconductor Interactive 3D Platform

6 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Visualization and Measurement zSpace Interactive 3D Environment Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy (STEM) Image Acquisition Ultra High-Resolution Imaging (Non-Destructive Samples) Focus on 3D Semiconductor Structures Platform With Electron Tomography

7 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Visualization and Measurement zSpace Interactive 3D Environment Nanoscale 3D X-Ray CT Image Acquisition Non-Destructive High-Resolution Imaging Focus on 3D Semiconductor Structures Platform With 3D X-Ray Imaging

8 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions FinFET Devices Through-Silicon Vias Silicon-Based MEMS Wafer-Level Packaging Stacked-Silicon Structures 3D Semiconductor Structures

9 S2 Partners System-Level Solutions Stanley Katz Broad industry experience with RCA Solid-State, Motorola Semiconductor, National Semiconductor, Hyundai Electronics America (Hynix),VLSI Technology, Mentor Graphics, Get2Chip and Cadence Design Systems. Served as VP and General Manager of Hynix’s $200M Semiconductor Division, built a successful domestic sales organization and provided worldwide strategic product direction. Served as VP and General Manager of VLSI Technology’s $125M Computer and Government ASIC Products Division, as well as managed Embedded Products Group for entire corporation. Silicon IP and EDA background includes providing strategic direction and interim general management services to Mentor Graphics IP Division. Served as VP Business Development for Get2Chip, successful EDA start-up company, drove international sales prior to being acquired by Cadence. Experience with thermal management, LED lighting and imaging solutions, including image acquisition tools and a virtual holographic environment. President of Silicon Software Partners, a value-added solutions provider of interactive 3D platforms for the semiconductor market. MSEE and BSEE (sole inventor of industry-standard 6-transistor SRAM) Management
